statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_data
SELECT id, user_id, click_through_rate FROM marketing_data
SELECT conversion_rate, user_id, timestamp FROM marketing_data
SELECT * FROM marketing_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, user_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM marketing_data WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, user_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate, timestamp FROM marketing_data WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, AVG(click_through_rate) AS average_ctr, AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_cr FROM marketing_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.5 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT id, timestamp FROM marketing_data WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 OR conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM marketing_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT MAX(click_through_rate) AS max_ctr, MIN(conversion_rate) AS min_cr FROM marketing_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM click_data;
SELECT user_id, click_timestamp FROM click_data ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_id, click_through_rate FROM click_data WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM conversion_data WHERE conversion_success = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, conversion_value FROM conversion_data ORDER BY conversion_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT click_id, user_id, page_id FROM click_data WHERE page_id = 50 AND click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT click_id, user_id, click_timestamp, page_id FROM click_data WHERE click_through_rate IS NULL;
SELECT click_id, user_id, page_id, click_through_rate FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 200 AND page_id = 30;

SELECT * FROM click_data INNER JOIN conversion_data ON click_data.user_id = conversion_data.user_id WHERE click_data.click_timestamp >= conversion_data.conversion_timestamp ORDER BY click_data.user_id, conversion_data.conversion_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY date DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT id, source, clicks FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, conversion_rate FROM conversion_data WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE source = 'Google' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, date, source, clicks FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, start_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%digital%' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT id, date, source, clicks FROM click_through_rates WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT id, date, conversion_rate, revenue FROM conversion_data WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, date, source, clicks FROM click_through_rates WHERE source IN ('Facebook', 'Instagram') ORDER BY source, date;
SELECT * FROM click_data ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_id, click_through_rate FROM click_data WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT page_name, category FROM page_info WHERE category = 'Technology' AND page_name LIKE '%News%';
SELECT user_id, name, email, location FROM user_info WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California');
SELECT user_id, page_id, conversion_rate FROM conversion_data ORDER BY conversion_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, click_time FROM click_data WHERE page_id = 201 AND click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_clicks FROM click_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_clicks > 10 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT user_info.name, page_info.page_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN page_info ON user_info.user_id = page_info.user_id WHERE user_info.location = 'New York';
SELECT avg(click_through_rate) AS average_ctr, avg(conversion_rate) AS average_cr FROM click_data LEFT JOIN conversion_data ON click_data.user_id = conversion_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_details WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE unit_price > 100.00 ORDER BY unit_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, conversion_count FROM conversion_data WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_count > 10 ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(conversion_count) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_conversions > 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_details WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
